translations.translation: On that Day, woe to the deniers!
Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
Woe on that Day to those that give the lie to the Truth!
On that day, woe would be upon those who have rejected God's revelations!
Ruin is for the deniers on that day!
Woe that Day to the deniers!
Woe on that day to the rejecters.
Woe that day unto those who cry it lies!
Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Woe on that Day to those who reject the truth!
Woe on that day Unto the beliers!
Woe to the deniers on that day!
Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!
Woe on that Day to those who belied it!
Woe on that Day to the liars.
Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
[77:47] Woe to the deniers on that day!
(Woe) severe punishment (unto the repudiators) of faith and the resurrection (on that day) the Day of Judgement! 721

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: { وَيْلٌ } عظيم { يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ } [المرسلات: 47] إذ عرضوا أنفسهم على العذاب المؤبَّد المخلَّد

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { ويل يومئذ للمكذِّبين } ، زيادة توبيخ وتقريع، أو: ويل يومئذ للمكذِّبين الذين كذَّبوا
